channel.title: iOS on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in iOS on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: WTF! TomTom you make Apple Maps really do suck
item.description: To me, I used Apple Maps on my iPad to check walking directions.

item.title: App Design: Storify - too many windows
item.description: Have you tried Storify? Is it just a little too busy?

item.title: App Design: Google+ updates app for iOS - result is impressive
item.description: Google+ has updated it's app for iPhones - Even though the app is not universal - you can see Google+ has high-res / retina display assets and so it renders quite ‘crisp’ even at 2x zoom on the iPad.
